name: Personalised Passport Stamps Heart Print
description: Tweet Delivery Time: 5-7 Days Capture and document your life adventures with this personalised travel inspired print. This print could not be more perfect for the jet-setters amongst us who would love to have a print to show off all the places around the world they have visited. There is something satisfying about looking at your passport and seeing all the places you have visited represented by a collection of stamps. I think passports have a sense of nostalgia to them; they aren't something you want to discard and throw away. This print has been a popular choice for weddings gifts - with the wedding day featuring as a prominent stamp in the heart and the other stamps including their honeymoon, where they got engaged, all the holidays they have been on together and locations of where the couple have lived. Another occasion this print has been popular for is milestone birthdays or anniversaries - using each stamp to mark an important event or holiday. Starting right from the beginning with a date and location of birth stamp, places they have lived throughout their life, holidays they have been on, schools and universities they have attended. Think of it as a this is your life print! List countries, cities, landmarks, events or places. There are no restrictions. I will digitally create a passport stamp for each item listed. The majority of the passport stamps will feature illustrations of a landmark or icon relating to the destination or event listed. Each print is made-to-order so I can easily acomodate any requests you may have. Finish the print off with a charming greeting message, such as "15 years of love and adventure" or simply a "happy birthday." Please flick through all the images to get some ideas. Printed on luxury 230gsm matt cotton rag paper. The frame comes ready-to-hang with a metal hanger already attached. The wood used is Italian and only sourced from sustainable resources. The mounts used are acid-free so the print and frame will last a lifetime. Frames available in black or white. The print itself is made up of from a bank of digitally designed passport stamps. I have been building up the collection since i launced my range of passport stamp prints in 2012. I now have over 1,000 stamps for cities and countries worldwide and i am continuing to add to this. Dimensions: Small A4 Print Size: 21x30cm. Frame Size: 30x40cm. Medium A3 :Print Size: 29x42cm. Frame Size: 42x52cm. Large A2: 59 x 42cm. Comes unframed. Extra Large A1: 84 x 59cm. Comes unframed. Square Medium: Print Size: 30x30cm Square Large: Print Size: 50x50cm I will contact you after your order to process your personalisation details.

name: Large Sleepy Birds Wall Sticker
description:
A charming wall sticker for the bedroom.

A lovely addition to any bedroom. Comes in a variety of colours.

This large wall sticker features birds flying away to represent the notion of drifting off into sleep.

A relaxation decoration for yours or your childs bedroom.

The sticker comes in a poster tube with easy step by step instructions. They're easy to apply and remove.

The wall sticker can be applied to any clean, smooth surface - including walls, doors, mirrors or furniture.

Made from:
Precision cut and made from high quality matt vinyl

Dimensions:
80x38cm

name: "Father" Sign Language Print
description:
A charming print spelling out "father" using the British sign language finger spelling alphabet. A brilliant gift for a new father. Or to give to your father for a birthday gift, or a fathers day gift.

A collaboration with my twin sister, Kathryn Lloyd, an upcoming fine artist who specialises in pencil drawing.

The sign language signals for the letters F,A,T,H,E,R have been beautifully hand drawn.

An enchanting print for your father to display with pride.

Available with or without the translation written under the hands.

Comes framed or unframed in black frame.

Made from:

Printed on luxury 230gsm matt cotton rag paper. The frame comes ready-to-hang with a metal hanger already attached. The wood used is Italian and only sourced from sustainable resources. The mounts used are acid-free so the print and frame will last a lifetime.

Dimensions:

Print Size: 70x15cm

name: Multi Aperture Frame and Printing Service
description:
Eight or nine of your photos professionally treated, printed and framed in a luxury rustic white frame.

Dig out those old photos that deserve more than to be hidden away in a photo album and never looked at. There is something so pleasing about aged photos.

You can either post me the photos (for me to return) or scan them and send them to me in a message. I will re-print your photos onto matt photo paper and professionally position, print and frame within each of the 5x5inch apertures.

You can have either nine photos printed or eight photos and a message in the last aperture - as shown in the display picture.

This would make a lovely gift for fathers day with a selection of family photos, for a milestone birthday or as a wedding gift.

Printed on luxury 190gsm matt paper. The frame comes ready-to-hang with a metal hanger already attached. The wood used is Italian and only sourced from sustainable resources. The mounts used are acid-free so the print and frame will last a lifetime.

I will contact you after your order to process your personalisation details.

description:
A pretty personalised wedding or anniversary card.

Personalised the card with a couples initials, message of your choice and date if relevant.

This makes it the perfect card to give on a wedding day or an anniversary.

The charming card also looks great framed as a keepsake.

You personalised info will be displayed within the handdrawn floral surround and printed onto luxury cottan rag paper.

Each card is made to order so i can easily accomodate and requests you may have.

name: Personalised Movie Strip Photo Print
description:
A personalised photo print in the style of a movie strip.

7 of your photos professionally printed in the style of an old movie strip. I can also frame the print for you, which comes professionally finished and ready to hang. Perfect as a self purchase to add intrigue to your walls or as a gift for a family member or friend.

Perhaps a good gift for a budding actor or actress.

Once you have placed your order i will be in touch within 24 hours to request your images.

Made from:
Printed on luxury 230gsm matt cotton rag paper. The frame comes ready-to-hang with a metal hanger already attached. The wood used is Italian and only sourced from sustainable resources. The mounts used are acid-free so the print and frame will last a lifetime.

name: Personalised Family Tree Print
description:
A charming personalised family tree print. A perfect gift for mothers day.

Personalise this print with your families full names and birthdays. You can also include a couple of lines of text of your choice at the bottom of the print.

The design is suited for 2-4 childrens names.

The parents name will sit at the top and the childrens names will feature within the pretty floral surround.

This print come framed or unframed.

Printed on luxury 315gsm matt cotton rag paper. The frame comes ready-to-hang with a metal hanger already attached. The wood used is Italian and only sourced from sustainable resources. The mounts used are acid-free so the print and frame will last a lifetime.

A4 Print Size: 21x29.7cm. Frame Size: 30x40cm.

I will contact you after your order to process your personalisation details.

description: Tweet Delivery Time: 5-7 Days A print to celebrate a newborn baby, personalised with the babies details. Printed on 310gsm matt paper, this print comes unframed. I will contact you after your order to process your personalisation details.

name: Personalised Child's Birth Stamp Wall Sticker
description:
A personalised wall sticker in the style of a postmark stamp.

A beautifully detailed wall sticker to go in a child's room.

Personalise with date, name and location of birth. There is also the option to include weight of birth.

Perfect as a self-purchase for your child's room or as a gift for a friend's newborn. A charming way to celebrate a birth.

The sticker comes in a poster tube with easy step by step instructions. They're easy to apply and remove.

The wall sticker can be applied to any clean, smooth surface - including walls, doors, mirrors or furniture.

Made from:
Precision cut and made from high quality matt vinyl

Dimensions:
43x43cm

name: A Cup of Tea Solves Everything
description: Tweet This print combines two of my passions - tea and typography. I love the reassuring British tradition of offering cups of tea to stressed out friends, with the sentiment that it will solve anything. The world would definitely be a better place if we could solve everything with a cuppa. It is printed in a variety of colours with a slight vintage paper texture - the colour really jumps off the page. Please select which colour you would like in the boxes on the right. All my prints are printed on the finest quality paper and using a photo inkjet printer that creates quality I know you won't be disappointed with. FRAMES: I offer a professional framing service, working with a locally based framing company that is noted as being one of the best in the UK. The wood used is Italian and only sourced from sustainable resources. The frame comes ready-to-hang with a string hanger already attached. The mounts used are acide-free so the print and frame will last a lifetime. PAPER: For this print, i use 240gsm satin paper that produces strong and vivid colours that last. A print personalised with the date of the marathon, the number of miles, and the time they finished it in. A bold print that allows the runner to display their achievement with pride.

A perfect gift for a marathon runner.

Also suitable for other races such as half marathons and triathlons.

name: 'ZZZ' William Blake Sleep Bedroom Quote Print
description: Tweet I wanted to create a relaxation print for the bedroom, so picked up on the idea of birds flying away to represent the notion of drifting off into sleep. I chose this blue as pastel blues are scientifically proven to create a calmer atmosphere. I picked this quote as its simplisitc break down of the day is somewhat refreshing, 'Think in the morning. Act in the noon. Eat in the Evening. Sleep in the night' - William Blake. FRAMES: I offer a professional framing service, working with a locally based framing company that is noted as being one of the best in the UK. name: Personalised Couples Special Date Print
description: Tweet Delivery Time: 5-7 Days A personalised passport stamp style print to celebrate a special destination and/or date. Personalise the passport stamp with a date and location that is important to you as a couple. This could be your first date, where you got engaged, married, or honeymooned. Your names will feature on the top of the stamp and along the bottom of the stamp you can have the text of your choice - it could just be a date or it could include a location too. We all have a special date and/or location that is important to us. This creates a perfect and charming memento. There a two design layouts for you to pick from. Made from: Printed on luxury 315gsm matt cotton rag paper. Printed with quality inks that create strong and vivid colours. The frame comes ready-to-hang with a metal hanger already attached. The wood used is Italian and only sourced from sustainable resources. The mounts used are acid-free so the print and frame will last a lifetime. name: Personalised Family Birthdays Print

A personalised family birthdays print.

A family print inspired by vintage postmarks.

There are two design available, as shown in the images. The first design allows you to include family members names, dates of birth, location of birth and weight at birth. The second design allows you to display family members names and dates of births.

A charming print for any family home, a perfect gift for a fellow family member or family friend.

Perfect for birthdays, christmas, mothers day or anniversaries.

Available in three different colours: red blue or black.

Display between 4 - 6 different family members.

Made from:

description: Tweet Delivery Time: 5-7 Days Personalise this print with a chosen couples names, so they can be celebrated alongside some of the most famous pairings. The ampersand is a symbol that represents a pairing or partnering of two things or people. This print is a celebration of all the adored, loved and most recognised pairings. This makes a perfect wedding gift, anniversary gift or any occasion gift for your loved one. A sophisticated stand out design. Personalise with a chosen couples names and initials. name: Save the date wedding Card
description:
A typographical A6 save the date wedding card. 

Printed on 350gsm, cotton rag card with rounded corners and a brown envelope.

The colours can be changed to suit your colour scheme, and the text can read how you like.

The price is for a sample card. If you are happy with the sample we can discuss colours and qualities.

Full wedding stationary in this style coming soon.

Each card is printed and hand-cut in my studio in cheshire, producing high quality results.

I will contact you after your order to process your personalisation details.

name: Personalised Christening Greeting Card
description:
A greeting card to celebrate the christening or baptism of a loved one.

A delightful christening card that features a church, with trees to either side of it, featuring a chick and a wise owl watching over him/her. The chick will change colour to suit the gender of the child. I can add an extra chick for twins, or even triplets!

This makes a lovely card and keepsake to celebrate a christening or baptism.

You can chose from two color schemes shown, or get in touch if you would rather use a different colour scheme. I am happy to work up a fresh colour scheme if you would like something a bit different.

Please fill in the boxes to the right with how you would like the invite personalised.

Made from:

Printed on luxury 230gsm cotton rag paper. Comes with either a white or brown envelope.

Dimensions:
A5

I will contact you after order to discuss how you would like the card personalised.
